branchCategory.name: ZSE2, Vacuum Switch, Single Mount or for ZX and ZR Vacuum Generator
branchCategory.description: <p>ZSE2 is a basic vacuum switch with 1 digital output (NPN or PNP).  No analog output is included.  The ZSE2 monitors vacuum level down to -101 kPa.  ZSE2 can be mounted in a ZX or ZR generator unit, or piped by metric or NPTF male threads.  A rotary trimmer adjusts the switch set point.  A red LED indicator also lights to correspond with the output signal.  Electrical connections include a 3 wire grommet cable or snap-in connector.  ZSE2 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ZSE2, Vacuum Switch, Single Mount or for ZX and ZR Vacuum Generator
